Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the shoulder and neck section of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394896) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394896)
